publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6898 Pauline McNeill: Congratulations to Shed Media—That the Parliament congratulates the TV production company, Shed Media, on its recent success; notes the company’s 22% year-on-year rise in adjusted profit to £6.2 million for the first half of 2010; believes that this demonstrates the hard work of all staff involved, and draws particular attention to the hard work and commitment of its founder, Eileen Gallagher.
S3M-6898 Congratulations to Shed Media (lodged on 2 September 2010) Linda Fabiani*
S3M-6898 Congratulations to Shed Media (lodged on 2 September 2010) David Stewart*
